li.label: ate super cucumber
li.description: It has a rather odd and slimy texture, but its taste is enthralling. It reminds me of a simpler time, a happier time.

li.label: ate cooked super cucumber
li.description: What a wonderful flavor. It evokes thoughts of peace, of happiness. Of fulfillment after a day of hard work. Alas, if only I could manifest all these feelings into reality...
